review: I love my Fire TV!!! It's become one of my favorite things. I don't use my DVDs much anymore just turn on my Fire TV and find a movie on Amazon instant video.
author: J. K. Massenburg

review: There is a really high pitch noise that plays with any program. This noise recently started and now won't go away.
author: Alesandrio Serradella

review: I love my amazon tv it does everything it says in the promo video plus it comes with. A short video that explains the features I would give 5 stars but the fact theirs no dedicated off button is a drawback for me
author: Brandon

review: search for prime free movies could be easier.  Overall, works very good.
author: Ronald H. Hesseltine

review: Love it....inexpensive alternative to expensive cable bills.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Despite a relatively easy to use experience for Amazon Prime content, Fire TV fails to provide a similar experience across their "supported" app universe (Youtube, Netflix). Lack of voice search, search auto-complete, and a seeming inability for the platform to remember where you left off watching make for an overall frustrating user experience that makes me wonder if I'd have been better off with a Roku box.
author: B. Corum

review: YES YES YES! I absolutely love it!
author: DeVonna

review: Not impressed and kind of disappointed. Retuned it after a week
author: Amazon Customer
